name: YouAreTheChair
description:
You are a chair, specifically THE chair. You are the only chair, and you must strive to find happiness and lead a fulfilling chair life. Try to get the people where they need to go before the time runs out.

--HOW TO--

'R' to Reset the game.
'UP' to Throw People.
'LEFT' to move left.
'RIGHT' to move right.
'Space' to Interact.

_________________________________

Credits:

Big thanks to my classmates for the feedback over the course of making this game.

Sound Effects obtained from freesound.org, under public domain, and edited by myself.

Music by myself.

Art by myself.

Coding by myself (with the exception of feedback and help from classmates).
